title: How does it work?
subtitle: Bilio is incredibly simple to use. Follow these three simple steps:

step1.title: Register your expense by sending a message
step1.description: Simply send a message or audio to Bilio with the amount and description of your expense or income.

step2.title: Bilio categorizes it automatically
step2.description: Our AI detects the expense category and records it in the right place.

step3.title: Receive daily reports and recommendations
step3.description: Get periodic analysis of your finances and personalized advice to improve.
